channel.title: CVE Feed for PenciDesign -- Soledad – Multipurpose, Newspaper, Blog & WooCommerce WordPress Theme
channel.description: The latest CVEs for PenciDesign -- Soledad – Multipurpose, Newspaper, Blog & WooCommerce WordPress Theme

item.title: CVE-2023-49825|2023-12-20T15:38:27.276Z -- pencidesign -- soledad%20%E2%80%93%20multipurpose%2C%20newspaper%2C%20blog%20%26%20woocommerce%20wordpress%20theme
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in PenciDesign Soledad – Multipurpose, Newspaper, Blog & WooCommerce WordPress Theme.This issue affects Soledad – Multipurpose, Newspaper, Blog & WooCommerce WordPress Theme: from n/a through 8.4.1.

item.title: CVE-2023-49826|2023-12-21T12:34:51.957Z -- pencidesign -- soledad%20%E2%80%93%20multipurpose%2C%20newspaper%2C%20blog%20%26%20woocommerce%20wordpress%20theme
item.description: Deserialization of Untrusted Data vulnerability in PenciDesign Soledad – Multipurpose, Newspaper, Blog & WooCommerce WordPress Theme.This issue affects Soledad – Multipurpose, Newspaper, Blog & WooCommerce WordPress Theme: from n/a through 8.4.1.

item.title: CVE-2023-49827|2023-12-14T14:32:12.339Z -- pencidesign -- soledad%20%E2%80%93%20multipurpose%2C%20newspaper%2C%20blog%20%26%20woocommerce%20wordpress%20theme
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in PenciDesign Soledad – Multipurpose, Newspaper, Blog & WooCommerce WordPress Theme allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Soledad – Multipurpose, Newspaper, Blog & WooCommerce WordPress Theme: from n/a through 8.4.1.
